name: Amani Collective
impact: Employing 150 artisans in Nairobi, creating sustainable fashion with traditional African prints
quote: JENGE's support helped us scale from a small workshop to a thriving enterprise, now exporting to 15 countries.

name: Sounds of Kenya
impact: Supporting 30 emerging musicians with studio access and mentorship
quote: The WE BUILD campaign gave us the foundation to build a state-of-the-art recording studio accessible to young talents.

name: Digital Creatives Hub
impact: Training 200+ youth in digital design, animation, and content creation annually
quote: With JENGE's endowment, we can offer scholarships to talented youth who couldn't afford creative education.
